Name: Pattern Recognition - IND
Text: We have a loan application process with strict normative rules and some recommended best practices desiderata We need to analyze three cases from an event log

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: First let me understand the normative constraints clearly 1 Application Received Credit Check Risk Assessment Loan Decision Inform Applicant If Approved Finalize Documentation Close Case 2 Credit Check must occur before Risk Assessment 3 Risk Assessment must occur before Loan Decision 4 Inform Applicant must occur after Loan Decision 5 If loan is approved Finalize Documentation must occur before Close Case 6 If loan is rejected do NOT finalize documentation before closing

Name: Deductive Reasoning - IND
Text: Desiderata recommendations not strict 1 Credit Check within 24 hours of Application Received 2 Inform Applicant within 48 hours of Loan Decision 3 Followup Call before closing the case encouraged but not required

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Now lets analyze each case Case 1 Application Received 20240110 0900 Credit Check 20240110 0930 30 minutes later OK Risk Assessment 20240110 1000 after Credit Check OK Loan Decision Approved 20240110 1100 after Risk Assessment OK Inform Applicant 20240110 1300 2 hours after decision OK Finalize Documentation 20240110 1330 after decision and info OK Close Case 20240110 1400 after documentation OK

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Normative check Sequence is correct Application Credit Check Risk Assessment Loan Decision Inform Applicant Finalize Documentation Close Case Credit Check before Risk Assessment Yes 0930 1000 Risk Assessment before Loan Decision Yes 1000 1100 Inform Applicant after Loan Decision Yes 1300 1100 Since approved Finalize Documentation before Close Case Yes 1330 1400 No contradictory actions No documentation after rejection was approved

Name: Validation - IND
Text: Desiderata check Credit Check within 24h of Application 30 minutes YES well within Inform Applicant within 48h of Loan Decision 2 hours YES well within Followup Call Not present in log

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Case 1 Result No normative violations Desiderata violations Missing Followup Call but this is just a recommendation

Name: Pattern Recognition - NE
Text: Case 2 Application Received 20240111 0800 Risk Assessment 20240111 0820 NO prior Credit Check this is a violation Credit Check 20240111 0900 happens AFTER Risk Assessment Loan Decision Rejected 20240111 0930 Finalize Documentation 20240111 1000 This is NOT allowed after rejection Close Case 20240111 1030

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Normative violations 1 Risk Assessment before Credit Check Credit Check must occur before any risk evaluation is done This is a clear violation The log shows Risk Assessment at 0820 but the first Credit Check is at 0900 2 Finalize Documentation after rejection If the loan is rejected the case should be closed without finalizing documentation This is a clear violation They finalized documentation even though decision was Rejected

Name: Backtracking - PE
Text: Desiderata check for Case 2 Wait theres no Inform Applicant activity in Case 2 Let me reread the log Looking at the log again for Case 2 Application Received 0800 Risk Assessment 0820 violation no Credit Check first Credit Check 0900 out of order Loan Decision Rejected 0930 Finalize Documentation 1000 violation should not happen for rejection Close Case 1030 Missing Inform Applicant activity entirely This is also a normative violation because Inform Applicant must occur after Loan Decision its missing entirely

Name: Validation - IND
Text: Desiderata for Case 2 Since theres no Inform Applicant we cant check the 48h rule but the absence of this required step is a normative issue not desiderata No Followup Call either but thats just a desideratum

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Case 3 Application Received 20240112 0900 Credit Check 20240114 1000 more than 24 hours later desideratum violation Risk Assessment 20240114 1100 after Credit Check OK Loan Decision Approved 20240114 1200 after Risk Assessment OK Inform Applicant 20240116 1500 later than 48 hours after decision desideratum violation Finalize Documentation 20240117 0900 after decision and info OK Close Case 20240117 1000 after documentation OK No Followup Call desideratum violation

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Normative check Sequence Application Credit Check Risk Assessment Loan Decision Inform Applicant Finalize Documentation Close Case all present and in order Credit Check before Risk Assessment Yes 14th 1000 14th 1100 Risk Assessment before Loan Decision Yes 14th 1100 14th 1200 Inform Applicant after Loan Decision Yes 16th 1500 14th 1200 Since approved Finalize Documentation before Close Case Yes 17th 0900 17th 1000 No contradictory actions No documentation after rejection was approved All normative rules are satisfied

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Desiderata violations 1 Credit Check not within 24h From 20240112 0900 to 20240114 1000 is 2 days 1 hour 49 hours which exceeds 24 hours 2 Inform Applicant not within 48h From 20240114 1200 to 20240116 1500 is 2 days 3 hours 51 hours which exceeds 48 hours 3 No Followup Call before closing

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Let me summarize my findings Case 1 Normative Fully compliant Desiderata Missing Followup Call minor Case 2 Normative Multiple violations 1 Risk Assessment performed before Credit Check order violation 2 Missing Inform Applicant step entirely required sequence violation 3 Finalize Documentation performed after Rejection decision contradiction Desiderata Missing Followup Call minor but overshadowed by normative issues Case 3 Normative Fully compliant Desiderata Three violations 1 Credit Check took 24h 49 hours 2 Inform Applicant took 48h 51 hours 3 No Followup Call

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Now I need to structure the answer clearly addressing each part of the task The task asks me to 1 Identify normative violations and explain reasons 2 Identify desiderata failures and clarify theyre not severe 3 Suggest interpretationsjustifications where possible For interpretationsjustifications Case 2 Could be a data entry error timestamps swapped for Risk Assessment and Credit Check or staff error The Finalize Documentation after Rejection could be a system glitch or human error where someone didnt check the decision status Case 3 The delays might be due to workload system downtime or waiting for additional information The missing followup call might be due to resource constraints I should present this in a clear structured format
